name: Love Fantasy
description:
About the GameYou are an ordinary person from the real world of 2021 and pulled into a fantasy world. Then you reluctantly become a hero to save the goddesses whose tasks were to create and preserve lives. Learn skills, buy items, upgrade stats, and so on to defeat the enemies.
Features: A branching storyline.
Tactics and fun match 3 puzzle game.
Special skills & items to counter challenging enemies.
High-quality artworks of characters and backgrounds.Hikaru
Hikaru fears loneliness and isolation the most, and because of this, she needs reassurance almost constantly. While she reciprocates willingly and generously, her dependence on the attention of others leaves her vulnerable and desperate.Iwe
Iwe feels unappreciated and taken for granted. While she does provide the essential strength that keeps the Unity continuing and the auras intermingling, she feels that her needs have gone unheard and unacknowledged.Odine
Ondine frequently gets lost in her reveries which she seems to prefer over what she considers harsh reality, no matter how pleasant reality may actually be.SilviaSilvia feels resentment towards those who are greedy and take more from her than they actually need. What’s more, she is deeply hurt when those same people deny her gifts to others.ChryseiaChryseia has always kept her distance from humanity because she has seen them do great good, she has also seen them do great evil as well.
